channel.title: Installation on DJMol Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on DJMol Docs

item.title: System Requirements
item.description: DJMol System Requirements Software: Windows 10-7 64 bit OS Java 1.8 or later, Python 3.x Hardware: At least 20 GB free space to install DJMol and add-ons. Preferred RAM size is 4 GB or higher.
